history.content:
If you have a previous faculty adviser, you will see the (blank) option and Save button.

If you don't have a previous faculty adviser, OR your previous adviser is no longer advising this semester (and therefore you can't choose him or her), this option will not be available, and therefore you just wait until later to select a brand new adviser.

The March 18 deadline only applies to people who need to choose between keeping or not keeping their previous adviser. If your previous adviser isn't there, this doesn't apply to you. Choose a new adviser when the time comes.

Hi, for the EECS Undergrad Advising site:

"Beginning March 16, returning students will have the opportunity to keep or change their adviser from last semester. If you want to change your adviser for this term, select "(blank)" and click "Save". If you want to keep your adviser, select the faculty’s name and click “Save”. You will have until March 18 to make this selection."

I don't see a "blank" or "Save" option. How do I select a new advisor?

Thank you!
history.subject: Selecting New Advisor
